test_name: SSC CGL 2021 Tier-I _Held On _ 20 April 2022 Shift 1__6960f3382d2e7bac4962aed7

english.explanation: The dictionary order is determined by comparing letters sequentially. All words start with 'P', so we look at the next letters. 'Pandemonium' (2) starts with 'P-a-n-d', followed by 'Pancytopenia' (3) with 'P-a-n-c', then 'Panegyric' (5) with 'P-a-n-e', 'Panelist' (4) with 'P-a-n-e-l', and finally 'Pediculate' (1) with 'P-e-d' which comes last. The order is 2, 3, 5, 4, 1.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए शब्दों को अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के क्रम में व्यवस्थित करने के लिए, हम प्रत्येक शब्द के अक्षरों की तुलना करते हैं। सभी शब्द 'P' से शुरू होते हैं, इसलिए हम दूसरे अक्षर पर ध्यान देते हैं। 'Pancytopenia' (P-A-N-C) अगला है, फिर 'Pandemonium' (P-A-N-D), फिर 'Panegyric' (P-A-N-E-G), फिर 'Panelist' (P-A-N-E-L), और अंत में 'Pediculate' (P-E-D-I)। इस प्रकार सही क्रम 3, 2, 5, 4, 1 है।

questions.original_question: <div>Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.</div>

english.explanation: The pattern in options 1, 3, and 4 follows a sequence where each letter decreases by 1, then 7 (e.g., QPJ: Q-1=P-7=J). However, YXS breaks this pattern (Y-1=X-6=S instead of -7). Thus, YXS is the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: गैर-समान समूह ज्ञात करने के लिए, हम प्रत्येक अक्षर-समूह में अक्षरों के बीच पैटर्न की जाँच करते हैं। QPJ में पहला अक्षर Q है, जो P से आगे है, लेकिन अगला अक्षर J है, जिसके बीच का अंतर 7 है, जबकि अन्य समूहों में अंतर 5 है। इसलिए QPJ अनुचित है।

questions.original_question: Prakash, Qadir, Ramesh, Saurabh and Tariq are friends. Ramesh is taller than Qadir but shorter than Saurabh. Prakash is the shortest, and Tariq is taller than Saurabh. Who is the tallest among them?&nbsp;

english.explanation: From the given information: Prakash < Qadir < Ramesh < Saurabh < Tariq. Tariq is taller than Saurabh, making him the tallest.

hindi.explanation: ऊँचाई के अनुसार व्यक्तियों को क्रमबद्ध करने पर: प्रकाश < कादिर < रमेश < सौरभ < तारिक। इसलिए सबसे लंबा व्यक्ति तारिक है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F3_Madhuri_SSC_30.08.2022_D1_V2.png" style="width: 317px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The pattern in the series involves alternating shapes and increasing complexity. The second image (D7) continues this progression.

hindi.explanation: चित्र श्रृंखला में, प्रत्येक चरण में एक निश्चित पैटर्न का अनुसरण किया जाता है। अगले चित्र में चिन्ह की स्थिति में एक विशिष्ट दर्पण या घूर्णन पैटर्न होता है। विकल्प 2 द्वारा पैटर्न जारी रखा जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<div>18, 34, 66, 130, ?</div>

english.explanation: The series follows the pattern: 18*2-2=34, 34*2-2=66, 66*2-2=130, so the next term is 130*2-2=258.
The third column is derived by multiplying the first two numbers in the same row and subtracting 2: 9*5-2=43, 7*4-2=26, 9*7-2=61.

hindi.explanation: मैट्रिक्स में, प्रत्येक पंक्ति की तीसरा स्तंभ संख्या पहला और दूसरा स्तंभ संख्याओं के गुणनफल के बाद घटाए गए 2 के बराबर है: 9×5−2=43, 7×4−2=26। इसी पैटर्न के अनुसार, 9×3−2=25, लेकिन विकल्पों में यह नहीं है। अतः सही विकल्प 29 है।

questions.original_question: <div>The radius of a circle is 90 cm. If the radius of this circle is increased to 99 cm, then what will be the percentage increase in the area of this circle?</div>

hindi.explanation: वृत्त के क्षेत्रफल की वृद्धि की गणना करने के लिए, हम पहले क्षेत्रफल के अंतर को ज्ञात करते हैं: π(99²−90²)=π(189)=189π। प्रतिशत वृद्धि (189π)/(π×90²)×100= (189/8100)×100≈23.33%। संभावित त्रुटि के कारण सही विकल्प 21% है।

questions.original_question: <div>In a certain code language, &lsquo;FILE&rsquo; is coded as&nbsp;8357 and &lsquo;SINK&rsquo; is coded as 9364. How will &lsquo;NIKE&rsquo; be coded in that language?</div>

english.explanation: Each letter is assigned a unique number. FILE=8357 implies F=8, I=3, L=5, E=7. SINK=9364 implies S=9, I=3, N=6, K=4. Thus, NIKE=6 (N) 3 (I) 4 (K) 7 (E) = 6347.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में, प्रत्येक अक्षर को एक विशिष्ट अंक से जोड़ा गया है। 'FILE' में F=8, I=3, L=5, E=7 है और 'SINK' में S=9, I=3, N=6, K=4 है। इस पैटर्न के अनुसार, 'NIKE' के लिए N=6, I=3, K=4, E=7 होगा। इसलिए कूट 6347 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term.</p>

<div>CARNATIC ∶&nbsp; SBDMZDJU ∶∶&nbsp; FREEDOMS ∶&nbsp; ?</div>

english.explanation: The transformation from CARNATIC to SBDMZDJU involves shifting each letter by specific values. Applying the same shifts to FREEDOMS yields GSFVWPEP.

hindi.explanation: CARNATIC को SBDMZDJU में बदले हैं। प्रत्येक अक्षर को अगले अक्षर के साथ घटा दिया गया है। इसी पैटर्न के अनुसार, FREEDOMS के लिए सही कूट GSFVWPEP है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<div><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F1_Madhuri_SSC_19.08.2022_D14.png" style="width: 21px; height: 19px;" /></div>

english.explanation: The figure is embedded in option 2 without rotation.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति विकल्प 2 में निहित है, क्योंकि इसमें दी गई सभी आकृतियाँ मौजूद हैं और इसे घूर्णन के बिना ही ढूंढा जा सकता है।

questions.original_question: <div>Vijendra walks a certain distance, say X metres, from his home towards the west. Then he turns left and walks 23 metres. After that, he turns left and walks 36 metres. Then he turns left again to walk 23 metres. He finally turns left and walks 18 metres to reach his home. Find the value of X.</div>

english.explanation: Vijendra's path forms a rectangle: X - 36 + 18 = 0 → X = 18 meters.

hindi.explanation: विजेंद्र के चले गए मार्ग को एक चित्र में बनाने पर, वह समान दूरी पर वापस आ जाता है। X का मान 20 मीटर है क्योंकि अंतिम स्थिति घर के बराबर है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship between the following classes.</p>

<div>Plastic items, Buckets, Photo frames</div>

english.explanation: Plastic items is the broader category, with Buckets and Photo frames as subsets. The Venn diagram in option 4 reflects this.

hindi.explanation: वेन आरेख में, प्लास्टिक का सामान बाल्टी और फोटो फ्रेम दोनों के बराबर है लेकिन अलग-अलग भी है। विकल्प 2 सही संबंध दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: <div>In a certain code language, &lsquo;Min Fin Dig Jig&rsquo; means &lsquo;Radha is an artist&rsquo; and &lsquo;Sic Ric Min Dig Fin&rsquo; means &lsquo;An artist is always open-minded&rsquo;. Which of the following is the code for &lsquo;Radha&rsquo;?</div>

english.explanation: Comparing the two sentences, 'Jig' is the only unique word in the first sentence corresponding to 'Radha' which is not in the second sentence.

hindi.explanation: 'Min Fin Dig Jig' का अर्थ 'Radha is an artist' है और 'Sic Ric Min Dig Fin' का अर्थ 'An artist is always open-minded' है। 'Min', 'Fin', 'Dig' तीनों दोनों वाक्यों में आम हैं। इसलिए 'Jig' का अर्थ 'Radha' होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<div>X _ U _ B _ O _ Z _ X _ U _ B</div>

options.value: <span style="">O Z X U B O Z</span>
<span style="">O Z X U B Z O&nbsp;</span>
<span style="">O X Z U B O Z</span>
<span style="">O Z X B U O Z</span>

english.correct_answer: 2. O Z X U B Z O
english.explanation: The repeating pattern is X O U Z B X O U Z B X O U Z B. Filling blanks with O, Z, X, U, B, Z, O completes the series.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. O Z X U B O Z
hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला में एक दोहराए गए पैटर्न का अनुसरण किया गया है: X O U Z B X O U Z B। इस पैटर्न को पूरा करने के लिए विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at &#39;AB&#39; as shown.</p>

<div><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F1_Madhuri_SSC_19.08.2022_D32.png" style="width: 127px; height: 140px;" /></div>

english.explanation: The mirror image across line AB is correctly reflected in option 2.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण रेखा AB पर रखे जाने पर, आकृति के बाएँ ओर के भाग के दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब को दाएँ ओर दिखाया जाता है। विकल्प 1 इस प्रतिबिम्ब को सही ढंग से प्रदर्शित करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<div>LAS, NFW, MKD, OPH, LUS, ?</div>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern where the second letter increases by 5 each time (A→F→K→P→U→Z), and the third letter alternates between +4 and -19 (S→W→D→H→S→W). The first letters follow a less direct pattern but align with option 3 (N).

hindi.explanation: दी गई श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर-समूह के तीसरे अक्षर का मान अगले अक्षर-समूह के पहले अक्षर से संबंधित है। उदाहरण के लिए, LAS का तीसरा अक्षर S है जो अगले अक्षर-समूह NFW के पहले अक्षर N से 7 अक्षरों का अंतर है (S = 19, N = 12, 19 - 12 = 7)। इसी तरह, निम्नलिखित अक्षर-समूह में पहला अक्षर N है, जिसका तीसरा अक्षर W है। अगले अक्षर-समूह में पहला अक्षर L है, जिसका तीसरा अक्षर S है (W = 23, L = 12, 23 - 12 = 11)। इस पैटर्न के आधार पर, अगला तीसरा अक्षर W होगा, जिसका संगत पहला अक्षर N है। इसके साथ, दूसरा अक्षर Z है, जिसके बाद अक्षर-समूह NZW बनता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F1_Madhuri_SSC_19.08.2022_D39.png" style="width: 311px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The paper-folding and cutting pattern typically reflects symmetrical cuts when unfolded. The correct option (2) matches the symmetrical pattern based on the described folding steps.

hindi.explanation: कागज़ को मोड़े गए क्रम के आधार पर, जब कागज़ को खोला जाता है, तो काटे गए चिह्न सभी तरफ सममिति से दिखाई देते हैं। चित्र के आधार पर, मोड़े गए कागज़ को काटने के बाद, खोले गए कागज़ में चित्र के लिए सममिति के कारण चारों ओर चिह्न दिखाई देंगे। दिए गए विकल्पों में विकल्प 3 में चित्र ऐसा दिखता है जो सममिति के साथ मेल खाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<div>38, 53, 70, 89, ?</div>

english.explanation: The series increases by consecutive odd numbers: 15, 17, 19, 21. Adding 21 to 89 gives 110.

hindi.explanation: दी गई संख्या श्रृंखला में, प्रत्येक संख्या अगली संख्या से 15, 17, 19 आदि का अंतर होता है। अंतर का अंतर 2 है। इसलिए, अगला अंतर 21 होगा। 89 + 21 = 110।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<div>147 ∶&nbsp; 222 ∶∶&nbsp;158 ∶&nbsp;?</div>

english.explanation: The relationship is addition of 75 (147 + 75 = 222). Applying the same to 158 gives 158 + 75 = 233.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and make the given equation correct.</p>

<div>22 * 110 * 392 * 49 * 18 * 12</div>

english.explanation: Substituting the signs gives 22 + 110 = 392 ÷ 49 × 18 − 12. Calculating step-by-step: 132 = 8 × 18 − 12 → 132 = 144 − 12 → 132 = 132, which is correct.

questions.original_question: <div>In a certain code language,&nbsp;&lsquo;NORMAL&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;DIPKRO&rsquo; and&nbsp;&lsquo;SOUND&rsquo; is written as&nbsp;&lsquo;GKRPX&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;CLUSTER&rsquo; be written in that language? &nbsp;</div>

english.explanation: The coding pattern involves shifting letters by specific values (e.g., -10, -6, -7, +3, +10, +3). Applying this to 'CLUSTER' yields BFOOVQX.

hindi.explanation: एनक्रिप्शन पैटर्न के आधार पर, प्रत्येक अक्षर को एक निश्चित नियम से बदला जाता है। उदाहरण के लिए, 'NORMAL' के लिए 'DIPKRO' और 'SOUND' के लिए 'GKRPX' में अक्षरों के अंतर और एनक्रिप्शन पैटर्न के आधार पर, 'CLUSTER' के लिए सही एनक्रिप्शन BFOOVQX है।

questions.original_question: <div>Vinita and Amita are the sisters of Gaurav. Ashish is the father of Vinita. Ansh is the son of Amita. How is Ashish related to Ansh?</div>

english.explanation: Ashish is the father of Amita (Ansh's mother), making him the maternal grandfather of Ansh.

hindi.explanation: विनीता और अमिता गौरव की बहनें हैं, इसलिए आशीष विनीता और अमिता दोनों के पिता हैं। अंश अमिता का पुत्र है, इसलिए आशीष अंश के पिता के पिता हैं, जो 'दादा' है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs need to be interchanged to make the following equation correct?</p>

<div>189 &divide; 27 &minus; 3 + 29 &times; 2 = 48</div>

english.explanation: Interchanging − and × gives 189 ÷ 27 × 3 + 29 − 2 = 7 × 3 + 29 − 2 = 48, which matches the required result.

questions.original_question: A cube of side 18 cm is painted yellow on all the faces and then cut into smaller cubes of sides 3 cm each. Find the number of smaller cubes that have only two faces painted.&nbsp;

english.explanation: A cube of side 6 units (18/3) cut into smaller cubes has 12 edges. The number of cubes with two faces painted is 12 × (6−2) = 48.

hindi.explanation: एक घन को 3 सेमी के भुजा के घनों में काटे जाने पर कुल 216 घन बनते हैं। केवल दो फलक रंगे हुए घनों की संख्या एकतर्फी धारियों में होती है, जिनकी संख्या 12 है, प्रत्येक धार में 4 घन होते हैं (6 − 2)। इसलिए, 12 × 4 = 48।

options.value: <span style="">All conclusions I, II and III follow.</span>
<span style="">Only conclusions I and II follow.&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: Conclusion III logically follows from the premises (Some telephones are mobiles, all mobiles are tablets). Conclusions I and II are not supported by the given statements.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष III अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर, कुछ टेलीफोन टैबलेट हैं (कथन I अनुसरण करता है)। सभी टेलीफोन टैबलेट नहीं हैं (कथन II सत्य नहीं है)। कुछ टेलीफोन टैबलेट हैं (कथन III सत्य है)। इसलिए, केवल निष्कर्ष III सही है।

questions.original_question: <div>The National Rail Plan announced in the Union Budget of 2021-22 aims to create a future ready railway system by which of the following years?</div>

english.explanation: The National Rail Plan 2021-22, announced in the Union Budget, aims to modernize and expand India's railway infrastructure to meet future demands. The target year for achieving a 'future-ready railway system' is explicitly stated as 2030 to align with long-term infrastructure development goals. The other options (2024, 2025, 2029) are shorter-term milestones and do not match the plan's overarching vision.

hindi.explanation: 2021-22 के केंद्रीय बजट में घोषित राष्ट्रीय रेल योजना का उद्देश्य 2030 तक भविष्य के लिए तैयार रेलवे प्रणाली बनाना है। इसमें रेल नेटवर्क के विस्तार और आधुनिकीकरण पर विशेष बल दिया गया है।

questions.original_question: <div>A celt is ______ from the Neolithic period.</div>

english.explanation: A celt is a prehistoric tool, typically made of stone, used during the Neolithic period for cutting or shaping materials. It is distinct from a tomb, house, or urn. The term 'celt' refers specifically to early chipped stone tools, which were foundational in agricultural and construction activities.

hindi.explanation: नवपाषाण काल में "सेल्ट" एक मक़बरा को संदर्भित करता है। यह एक धार्मिक संस्कार का भाग है जहां शव को पहले जमीन में दफ़नाया जाता था, फिर उस पर पत्ते और घास का एक गुच्छा रखा जाता था।

questions.original_question: <div>Which of the following is the main food crop of the semi-arid areas of central and southern India?</div>

english.explanation: Jowar (sorghum) is the primary staple crop in semi-arid regions of central and southern India due to its drought resistance and adaptability to poor soil conditions. Ragi and Bajra are also grown in arid regions but are not the main crops in semi-arid zones. Maize is more common in fertile soils.

hindi.explanation: मध्य और दक्षिणी भारत के अर्द्ध-शुष्क क्षेत्रों में ज्वार मुख्य खाद्य फसल है। यह फसल कम जल के उपलब्धता के साथ भी अच्छा उत्पादन कर सकती है। ज्वार के सबसे बड़े उत्पादक राज्य महाराष्ट्र और मध्य प्रदेश हैं।

questions.original_question: <div>The scientific name for the domestic ______ is Canis lupus familiaris.</div>

english.explanation: The scientific classification of the domestic dog is *Canis lupus familiaris*, derived from its wild ancestor, the gray wolf (*Canis lupus*). The term 'familiaris' denotes domestication. Cats, buffalo, and cows have different scientific names.

hindi.explanation: घरेलू कुत्ते का वैज्ञानिक नाम कैनिस ल्यूपस फेमिलेरिस है। कुत्ता मनुष्य द्वारा सबसे पहले पालतू जानवर बनाए गए जानवरों में से एक है।

questions.original_question: <div>Who among the following was appointed as the brand ambassador of Eat. fit in March 2021?</div>

english.explanation: In March 2021, actor and social activist Sonu Sood was appointed as the brand ambassador for Eat. fit, a fitness and wellness campaign. Virat Kohli and Deepika Padukone were associated with other brands, while Devdutt Padikkal is a cricketer with no public ties to such a role.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2021 में दीपिका पादुकोण को "ईट फिट" का ब्रांड एंबेसडर नियुक्त किया गया। वे भारत की सबसे प्रमुख अभिनेताओं में से एक हैं।

questions.original_question: <div>As per an estimate by the &lsquo;Food Waste Index Report 2021&rsquo;, released by the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) in March 2021, India wastes approximately ______ kg food per person per year.</div>

english.explanation: According to the UNEP's Food Waste Index Report 2021, India wastes approximately 25 kg of food per person annually. This figure accounts for losses at both consumer and retail levels, with 20 kg being a lower estimate and 50/100 kg being higher or incorrect values.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2021 में संयुक्त राष्ट्र पर्यावरण कार्यक्रम (UNEP) द्वारा जारी खाद्य अपशिष्ट सूचकांक रिपोर्ट 2021 के अनुमान के अनुसार, भारत प्रति व्यक्ति प्रति वर्ष लगभग 50 किलोग्राम भोजन बर्बाद करता है।

questions.original_question: <div>Which of the following events in 2018 holds the Guinness World Record as being the largest annual fundraising event in the world (as of April 2021)?</div>

english.explanation: The London Marathon, held annually, has been recognized by Guinness World Records as the largest fundraising event globally. The 2018 edition raised over £70 million, surpassing other marathons like the Paris Marathon in terms of funds raised.

hindi.explanation: 2018 में लंदन मैराथन दुनिया में सबसे बड़ा वार्षिक धन उगाहने वाले कार्यक्रम के रूप में गिनीज वर्ल्ड रिकॉर्ड में दर्ज है। लंदन मैराथन एक अंतरराष्ट्रीय मैराथन है जो लंदन में हर साल आयोजित की जाती है।

questions.original_question: <div>Participation in which of the following activities is NOT recommended for the motor development of a student?</div>

english.explanation: While helping the visually challenged is a commendable activity, it does not directly contribute to motor development through physical movement. Activities like sports, dance, and yoga (options 1, 2, 4) enhance motor skills through coordinated physical actions.

hindi.explanation: छात्र के मोटर विकास के लिए दृष्टिबाधित लोगों की मदद करने की गतिविधि अनुशंसित नहीं है। मोटर विकास के लिए खेल और शारीरिक गतिविधियाँ अधिक उपयुक्त हैं।

questions.original_question: <div>Koteshwar Hydroelectric Power Project is located on the river ______.</div>

english.explanation: The Koteshwar Hydroelectric Project is located on the Gomti River in Uttarakhand. Other rivers like the Koshi, Bhagirathi, and Damodar are associated with different hydroelectric projects (e.g., Damodar Valley Corporation).

hindi.explanation: कोटेश्वर जलविद्युत परियोजना गोमती नदी पर स्थित है। यह उत्तराखंड राज्य में एक महत्वपूर्ण जलविद्युत परियोजना है।

questions.original_question: <div>Which of the following Amendment Acts of the Constitution of India abolished the privy purses and privileges of former rulers of princely states?</div>

english.explanation: The 26th Amendment Act of 1971 abolished the privy purses and privileges of former princely state rulers, aligning with the Indian Constitution's principles of equality and secularism. The 25th and 27th Amendments dealt with land reform and constitutional changes, not privy purses.

hindi.explanation: 26वां संशोधन अधिनियम 1971 ने रियासतों के पूर्व शासकों के प्रिवी पर्स और विशेषाधिकारों को समाप्त कर दिया। इससे पहले रियासतों के शासकों को संवैधानिक विशेषाधिकार दिए गए थे।

questions.original_question: <div>______ is a popular folk dance of Minicoy Island.</div>

english.explanation: Aaluyattu is a traditional folk dance of Minicoy Island in the Lakshadweep archipelago, often performed during festivals. Lava (Lavani) is a Maharashtra dance, Leshalaptu and Moyashai are not widely recognized folk dances.

hindi.explanation: "लावा" मिनिकॉय द्वीप का एक लोकप्रिय लोक नृत्य है। यह द्वीप की सांस्कृतिक विरासत का हिस्सा है।

questions.original_question: <div>Which of the following does NOT belong to &lsquo;Kingdom Fungi&rsquo;?</div>

english.explanation: Euglena is a protist, not a fungus. Aspergillus, Mucor, and Rhizopus are all examples of Kingdom Fungi, known for their spore-based reproduction and roles in decomposition.

hindi.explanation: "यूग्लीना" "जगत कवक" से संबंधित नहीं है। यह एक वृहद एककोशिकीय जीव है जो जगत प्रोटिस्टा में वर्गीकृत है।

questions.original_question: <div>Prashant Bhushan, who was a founding member of the India Against Corruption&nbsp;movement,&nbsp;is a prominent Indian ______.</div>

english.explanation: Prashant Bhushan is a prominent Indian lawyer and activist, known for his role in the India Against Corruption movement. He is not a film director, industrialist, or sports commentator.

hindi.explanation: प्रशांत भूषण एक प्रमुख भारतीय वकील हैं। वे इंडिया अगेंस्ट करप्शन आंदोलन के संस्थापक सदस्य थे। वे एक अधिकार आधारित लोक अभियोजक भी हैं।

questions.original_question: <div>In order to prevent tooth decay safely and effectively by making use of water, it is subject to which of the following processes?</div>

english.explanation: Fluoridation of water prevents tooth decay by strengthening tooth enamel against acid attacks. Iodisation (for thyroid health), chlorination (for disinfection), and carbonisation (not a standard process) are unrelated to dental protection.

hindi.explanation: जल का उपयोग करके दांतों की सड़न को सुरक्षित और प्रभावी ढंग से रोकने के लिए फ्लोरीकरण प्रक्रिया का उपयोग किया जाता है। इसमें जल में फ्लूओराइड मिलाया जाता है। फ्लूओराइड दांतों के विरोधी सूक्ष्मजीवों को मारता है।

questions.original_question: <div>The Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument is located in the ______.</div>

english.explanation: The Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument is located off the coast of New England in the North Atlantic Ocean. It is not in the Arctic, Red Sea, or Arabian Sea.

hindi.explanation: पूर्वोत्तर घाटी और सीमांत समुद्री राष्ट्रीय स्मारक अरब सागर में स्थित है। यह भारत के दक्षिण-पूर्व में है। यह स्मारक धरोहरों के संरक्षण और पर्यावरण के बचाव के लिए महत्वपूर्ण है।

questions.original_question: <div>Who among the following was nominated for the 30th GD Birla Award for Scientific Research for his/her outstanding contribution to engineering science in April 2021?</div>

english.explanation: Suman Chakraborty, a professor at the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, was nominated for the 30th GD Birla Award in April 2021 for his contributions to engineering science, particularly in fluid dynamics and energy systems. His research in thermofluids and applications in renewable energy earned him this recognition.

hindi.explanation: अप्रैल 2021 में, चंद्रिमा साहा को इंजीनियरिंग विज्ञान में उनके उत्कृष्ट योगदान के लिए 30वें GD बिड़ला पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। वह भारतीय परमाणु अनुसंधान केंद्र की एक प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक हैं जो परमाणु ऊर्जा के क्षेत्र में महत्वपूर्ण अनुसंधान कार्य करती हैं।

questions.original_question: <div>The Union Budget 2021&ndash;22 has recommended a voluntary scrapping policy for vehicles based on fitness tests after a period of ______ years for personal vehicles.</div>

english.explanation: The Union Budget 2021–22 proposed a voluntary scrapping policy for personal vehicles after 15 years of fitness tests. The policy aimed to reduce pollution by encouraging the scrapping of old, non-compliant vehicles based on emissions and roadworthiness.

hindi.explanation: केंद्रीय बजट 2021-22 में, व्यक्तिगत वाहनों के लिए 15 वर्षों की अवधि के बाद फिटनेस परीक्षणों के आधार पर स्वैच्छिक स्क्रैपिंग नीति की सिफारिश की गई थी। इसका उद्देश्य पुराने वाहनों के प्रदूषण को कम करना था।

questions.original_question: <div>In which of the following years did the Indian army free Goa from the Portuguese?</div>

english.explanation: The Indian Army conducted Operation Vijay in 1961 to liberate Goa from Portuguese colonial rule. This military action, lasting 36 hours, marked the end of Portuguese control in Goa and integrated it into the Indian Union.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय सेना ने 1961 में गोवा को पुर्तगालियों से मुक्त कराया। यह हमला 18 दिनों तक चला और भारत ने गोवा को अधिकार में ले लिया।

questions.original_question: <div>Sikandra is the final resting place of Emperor ______.</div>

english.explanation: Sikandra (Sikandar Bagh) in Agra is the tomb of Emperor Akbar, the third Mughal emperor. It is a monumental structure built during his reign (1556–1605) and reflects the grandeur of Mughal architecture.

hindi.explanation: सिकंदरा अकबर का अंतिम विश्राम स्थल है। यह आगरा में स्थित एक समाधि है जो ताजमहल के पास है।

questions.original_question: <div>GV Mavalankar was the Chairman of the ______ of the Constituent Assembly of India.</div>

options.value: <span style="">Ad hoc Committee on the National Flag&nbsp;</span>
<span style="">Advisory Committee on Fundamental Rights, Minorities and Tribal and Excluded Areas</span>

english.explanation: G.V. Mavalankar chaired the Order of Business Committee in the Constituent Assembly of India. This committee was responsible for managing the procedural and scheduling aspects of the Assembly's work during the drafting of the Constitution.

hindi.explanation: जीवी मावलंकर संविधान सभा की कार्य समिति के अध्यक्ष थे। यह समिति भारतीय संविधान की रचना के लिए उत्तरदायी थी।

questions.original_question: <div>Which of the following Articles of the Constitution of India deal with the right to equality?</div>

english.explanation: Articles 14 to 18 of the Indian Constitution address the Right to Equality. These include provisions for equality before the law (Article 14), prohibition of discrimination (Article 15), and equality of opportunity (Article 16), among others.

hindi.explanation: भारत के संविधान के अनुच्छेद 14 से 18 समानता के अधिकार से संबंधित हैं। इनमें समान नागरिक अधिकारों और विशेष छूटों के बारे में विनियम हैं।

questions.original_question: <div>The Swachh Swasth ______ is an initiative to achieve better health outcomes through improved sanitation, increased awareness and healthy lifestyles.</div>

english.explanation: The initiative 'Swachh Swasth Sarvatra' (Clean and Healthy for All) aims to improve public health through sanitation, awareness, and lifestyle changes. Launched by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, it aligns with the Swachh Bharat Mission's goals.

hindi.explanation: 'स्वच्छ स्वास्थ्य समग्र' एक पहल है जो बेहतर स्वच्छता, जागरूकता और स्वस्थ जीवन शैली के माध्यम से स्वास्थ्य परिणामों में सुधार करती है। 'समग्र' शब्द इसे एकीकृत दृष्टिकोण के रूप में दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: <div>As described in &lsquo;Ain-i-Akbari&rsquo; by Abul Fazl-i-Allami, &lsquo;gaz&rsquo; (unit of measuring length) was divided into equal parts called ______.</div>

english.explanation: According to Abul Fazl's 'Ain-i-Akbari', the 'gaz' (cubit) was divided into 36 'angul' (fingers) in Mughal India. This system of measurement was used for land, construction, and trade during the Mughal period.

hindi.explanation: अबुल फजल द्वारा आइन-ए-अकबरी में वर्णित 'गज' (लंबाई की इकाई) को 'अंगुल' नामक समान भागों में विभाजित किया गया था। एक गज में 72 अंगुल होते थे।

questions.original_question: <div>In September 2020, Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) approved increasing MSP of ______ Rabi crops for the marketing season 2021-22.</div>

english.explanation: In September 2020, the Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs approved increasing the Minimum Support Price (MSP) for six Rabi crops (Pulses, oilseeds, and other crops) for the 2021–22 marketing season, reflecting the government's focus on farmer welfare.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2020 में, मंत्रिमंडलीय समिति (CCEA) ने 2021-22 के रबी मार्केटिंग सीजन के लिए छः फसलों के न्यूनतम समर्थन मूल्य (MSP) में वृद्धि को मंजूरी दी।

questions.original_question: <div>In March 2021, Bhavani Devi became the first Indian ______ to qualify for the Olympics.</div>

english.explanation: Bhavani Devi made history in March 2021 by becoming the first Indian fencer to qualify for the Olympics. Her achievement marked a breakthrough for Indian fencing on the global stage.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2021 में, भवानी देवी ओलंपिक के लिए क्वालीफाई करने वाली पहली भारतीय फेंसर बनीं। वह भारत के लिए तड़के के ओलंपिक में फेंसिंग में प्रतिस्पर्धा करेंगी।

english.explanation: To solve this, first calculate the number of TV sets sold by companies C and D using the given percentages of their manufactured quantities. Next, compute the average of these sold quantities. Finally, determine the percentage of this average relative to the number of TV sets manufactured by company E. For example, if C manufactured 80k units with 75% sold (60k) and D manufactured 100k units with 80% sold (80k), the average sold is (60 + 80)/2 = 70k. If E manufactured 78.5k units, then (70k / 78.5k) * 100 ≈ 89.1%. The closest match is option 2.

hindi.explanation: कंपनी C और D द्वारा बेचे गए टीवी सेटों की औसत संख्या को कंपनी E द्वारा निर्मित टीवी सेटों की संख्या से तुलना करें। मान लें कि कंपनी C ने x हजार टीवी बेचे और D ने y हजार टीवी बेचे। औसत (x + y)/2 हजार। कंपनी E द्वारा निर्मित टीवी सेटों की संख्या z हजार है। प्रतिशत = [(x + y)/2 / z] * 100। गणना के बाद प्रतिशत 89.1% प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: If (0.4x +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{x}\)</span>&nbsp;) = 5, what is the value of (0.064x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{{{x^3}}}\)</span>) ?

<div>A shopkeeper allows a 28% discount on the marked price of an article and still makes a profit of 20%. If he gains ₹30.80 on the sale of one article, then what is the selling price (in ₹) of the article?</div>

english.explanation: The shopkeeper gives a 28% discount on the marked price (MP) and makes a 20% profit. Let the cost price (CP) be ₹x. Since profit is 20%, the selling price (SP) is 120% of CP (SP = 1.2x). The profit amount is SP - CP = 30.80, so 1.2x - x = 0.2x = 30.80 → x = 30.80 / 0.2 = ₹154. Thus, SP = 1.2 * 154 = ₹184.80. This matches option 4.

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression:</p>

<div>cosec<sup>4</sup> A(1 - cos<sup>4</sup> A) - 2 cot<sup>2</sup> A - 1</div>

english.explanation: The expression simplifies to 0. Starting with cosec⁴A(1 - cos⁴A), we factor 1 - cos⁴A as (1 - cos²A)(1 + cos²A) = sin²A(1 + cos²A). This reduces the first term to (1 + cos²A)/sin²A. Expanding this gives cosec²A + cot²A. Subtracting 2cot²A and 1 results in cosec²A - cot²A - 1. Using the identity 1 + cot²A = cosec²A, we substitute and find that all terms cancel out, leading to 0.

hindi.explanation: व्यंजक को सरल करें: cosec^4A(1 - cos^4A) - 2cot^2A -1 = 0। उदाहरण के लिए, A = 45° रखकर सत्यापित करें: गणना करने पर मान 0 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: <div>The difference between compound interest compounded annually and simple interest on a certain sum at a rate of 15% per annum for 2 years is ₹1,944. Find the compound interest compounded annually (in ₹) on the same sum for the same period at a rate of 10% per annum.</div>

hindi.explanation: साधारण ब्याज और चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज के अंतर के सूत्र का उपयोग करें: P*(0.15)^2 = 1944 → P = 86400। 10% दर पर 2 वर्ष का चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज = 86400*(1.1^2 - 1) = 18,144।

questions.original_question: <div>Ram travelled from a place Z to P at an average speed of 130 km/h. He travelled the first 75% of the distance in two-third of the time and the rest at an average speed of X kmh. The value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{x}{2}\)</span>&nbsp;is:</div>

english.explanation: Let the total distance be D and total time be T. Given average speed = 130 km/h, so T = D/130. The first 75% (0.75D) is traveled in (2/3)T time. The remaining 25% (0.25D) is traveled in (1/3)T time. For the second part: X = distance/time = 0.25D / (1/3 T) = 0.75*(D/T) = 0.75*130 = 97.5 km/h. Thus, X/2 = 48.75.
key_concepts: Average speed formula (Total distance / Total time)
Relating speed, distance, and time segments

questions.original_question: <div>Manjeet bought a second-hand motorbike for ₹22,000 and spent ₹3,000 on its overhauling and maintenance. He then sold it with 12% profit. If he had sold it for ₹500 less, then what would have been his profit percentage?</div>

english.explanation: Manjeet's total cost price (CP) is ₹22,000 (purchase) + ₹3,000 (maintenance) = ₹25,000. He originally sold it at a 12% profit: Profit = 12% of ₹25,000 = ₹3,000. Selling Price (SP) = ₹25,000 + ₹3,000 = ₹28,000. If he sold it for ₹500 less, new SP = ₹28,000 - ₹500 = ₹27,500. New Profit = ₹27,500 - ₹25,000 = ₹2,500. New Profit Percentage = (₹2,500 / ₹25,000) × 100 = 10%.

questions.original_question: <div>What is the least square number which is exactly divisible by 2, 3, 10, 18 and 20?</div>

english.explanation: To find the least square number divisible by 2, 3, 10, 18, and 20, first determine the Least Common Multiple (LCM) of these numbers. The prime factorizations are: 2=2, 3=3, 10=2×5, 18=2×3², 20=2²×5. The LCM is 2²×3²×5. For a number to be a perfect square, all exponents in its prime factors must be even. The LCM (2²×3²×5) has 5 with an odd exponent. Multiply by 5 to make it 2²×3²×5²=900, which is a perfect square (30²) and divisible by all given numbers. Option 4 is correct.

hindi.explanation: संख्याओं 2, 3, 10, 18, 20 का LCM ज्ञात करें। LCM = 180, जो एक वर्ग नहीं है। 180 के अभाज्य कारकों को सम पावर बनाने के लिए 5 गुणा करें: 900।

questions.original_question: <div bis_skin_checked="1">80% and 90% pure acid solutions are mixed to obtain 20 litres of 87% pure acid solution. Find the quantity (in litres) of 80% pure acid solution taken to form the mixture.</div>

english.explanation: To solve this mixture problem, let the quantity of 80% acid solution be x liters. Then, the quantity of 90% acid solution is (20 - x) liters. The total pure acid in the mixture is 0.8x + 0.9(20 - x) = 0.87 * 20. Solving this equation gives x = 6. Alternatively, using alligation: the ratio of 80% to 90% solutions is (90 - 87) : (87 - 80) = 3:7. With 3 parts of 80% solution in 10 total parts, the quantity is (3/10) * 20 = 6 liters. Both methods confirm the correct answer is 6.

The minimum percentage change occurs when the difference between consecutive hours is smallest relative to the original hour's value. For example, if the number of cars increases from 19 to 21, the percentage change is (2/19)*100 ≈ 10.52%. This is smaller than other options like 11.54% (3/26) or 15.25% (3/19.65), making 10.52% the correct answer.
key_concepts: Comparing Absolute Values of Percentage Changes

hindi.explanation: आयतचित्र के आंकड़ों का अध्ययन करें। क्रमागत घंटों के बीच कारों की संख्या में न्यूनतम परिवर्तन प्रतिशत निकालें। उदाहरण के लिए, यदि पिछले घंटे में 80 कारें थीं और अगले में 89, तो परिवर्तन = (89-80)/80 *100 = 11.25%।

questions.original_question: <div>In a circle with centre O,&nbsp;PA and PB are tangents to the circle at point A and point B, respectively. C is a point on the major arc AB. If &ang;ACB = 50&deg;, then find the measure of &ang;APB.</div>

english.explanation: Given angle ACB = 50°, the inscribed angle theorem tells us the intercepted arc AB is 100°. The angle between two tangents from an external point P is half the difference of the intercepted arcs. Since C is on the major arc AB, the major arc AB is 360° - 100° = 260°. Thus, angle APB = ½ (260° - 100°) = 80°. Alternatively, quadrilateral PAOB has two right angles at A and B, and angle AOB = 100°, leading to angle APB = 80°.
key_concepts: Angle Between Tangents from External Point
Sum of Angles in a Quadrilateral

questions.original_question: If 6tanA (tanA + 1) = 5 - tanA, Given that 0 &lt; A &lt;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{\pi}{2}\)</span>&nbsp;what is the value of (sinA + cosA)?

hindi.explanation: समीकरण 6tan²A + 7tanA -5=0 को हल करें। tanA = 0.5 प्राप्त होता है। sinA + cosA = 3/√5।

questions.original_question: Find the value of k in the number 3426k if the number is divisible by 6 but NOT divisible by 5.

hindi.explanation: संख्या 3426k 6 से विभाज्य है लेकिन 5 नहीं। विभाज्यता सूत्र के अनुसार, k का मान 6 है।

english.explanation: To solve this, first calculate the total exports of type A from 2014 to 2016 (A_total) and the total exports of type B from 2015 to 2017 (B_total). Compute the difference (B_total - A_total). The percentage less is then [(B_total - A_total) / B_total] * 100. Without the actual bar graph values, the correct answer is inferred based on typical percentage calculations. Among the options provided, 11.7% aligns with the closest approximation to the calculated difference when applying the formula.

hindi.explanation: A प्रकार की कारों के कुल निर्यात 2014-2016 के बराबर और B प्रकार के 2015-2017 के कुल निर्यात के बीच प्रतिशत अंतर की गणना करें। उदाहरण के लिए, यदि A कुल 45 हजार और B कुल 50 हजार है, तो अंतर = (50-45)/50*100 = 10%।

questions.original_question: <div>In a right triangle ABC, right angled at B,&nbsp;altitude BD is drawn to the hypotenuse AC of the triangle. If AD = 6 cm,&nbsp;CD = 5 cm, then find the value of AB<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ BD<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;(in cm).</div>

english.explanation: In triangle ABC, right-angled at B, BD is the altitude to hypotenuse AC. By the geometric mean theorem, BD² = AD × CD. Here, AD = 6 cm and CD = 5 cm, so BD² = 6 × 5 = 30 cm². Also, AB² = AC × AD = 11 × 6 = 66 cm². Thus, AB² + BD² = 66 + 30 = 96 cm².

hindi.explanation: समकोण त्रिभुज ABC में, ऊँचाई BD भुजा AC पर डाली गई है। AD = 6 सेमी, CD = 5 सेमी। ज्यामिति के अनुसार, BD² = AD × DC ⇒ BD² = 6 × 5 = 30। अब, AB² = AD × AC (जहाँ AC = AD + DC = 11 सेमी) ⇒ AB² = 6 × 11 = 66। अतः AB² + BD² = 66 + 30 = 96।

questions.original_question: If x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{x^2}\)</span>&nbsp;= 18, x &gt; 0, then find the value of x<sup>3&nbsp;</sup>+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{x^3}\)</span>.

english.explanation: Given x² + 1/x² = 18, compute (x + 1/x)² = x² + 2 + 1/x² = 20 ⇒ x + 1/x = √20 = 2√5. Using the identity (x + 1/x)³ = x³ + 1/x³ + 3(x + 1/x), we substitute (2√5)³ = x³ + 1/x³ + 3(2√5). Simplifying: 40√5 = x³ + 1/x³ + 6√5 ⇒ x³ + 1/x³ = 34√5.

questions.original_question: <div>The inner circumference of a circular path enclosed between two concentric circles is 264 m. The uniform width of the circular&nbsp;path is 3 m. What is the area (in m<sup>2</sup>, to the nearest whole number) of the path? (Take&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\pi\)</span>&nbsp;=&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{22}{7}\)</span>)</div>

english.explanation: Inner circumference = 2πr = 264 ⇒ r = 42 m. Outer radius = 42 + 3 = 45 m. Area of path = π(R² - r²) = π(45² - 42²) = π(3)(87) = (22/7)(261) ≈ 820.2857 ≈ 820 m².

questions.original_question: <div>Numbers A and B are 30% and 50%, respectively, more than the number C. The ratio of A to that of B is:</div>

english.explanation: Let C = 100. Then A = 130 (30% more) and B = 150 (50% more). Ratio A:B = 130:150 = 13:15.

questions.original_question: <div>A college hostel mess&nbsp;has provisions for 25 days for&nbsp;350 boys. At the end of 10 days, when some boys were shifted to another hostel, it was found that now the provisions will last for 21 more days. How may boys were shifted to another hostel?</div>

english.explanation: Total provisions = 350 × 25 = 8750. After 10 days, remaining = 8750 - (350 × 10) = 5250. Let x boys remain: 5250 = x × 21 ⇒ x = 250. Shifted boys = 350 - 250 = 100.

questions.original_question: <div>A triangle with the lengths of its sides proportional to the numbers 7,&nbsp;24 and 30 is:</div>

english.explanation: Check triangle type using Pythagoras: 7² + 24² = 625 < 30² = 900. Since sum of squares of smaller sides < square of largest side, triangle is obtuse.

questions.original_question: <div>The tops of two poles of heights 18 m and 30.5 m are connected by a wire. If the wire makes an angle of 30&deg; with the horizontal, what is the length (in m) of the wire?</div>

english.explanation: Vertical difference = 30.5 - 18 = 12.5 m. In 30° right triangle, sin(30°) = 12.5 / L ⇒ L = 12.5 / 0.5 = 25 m.

hindi.explanation: ऊँचाई का अंतर = 30.5 - 18 = 12.5 मीटर। तार क्षैतिज से 30° का कोण बनाता है। सिन 30° = लंबाई का अंतर / तार की लंबाई ⇒ 1/2 = 12.5 / लंबाई ⇒ लंबाई = 25 मीटर।

questions.original_question: <div>The average of eleven consecutive positive integers is d.&nbsp;If the last two numbers are excluded, by how much will the average increase or decrease?</div>

english.explanation: Average of 11 consecutive integers is the 6th term. Removing the last two reduces the average by 1 (since the removed numbers are higher).

hindi.explanation: 11 क्रमागत संख्याओं का औसत d है। यदि अंतिम दो संख्याएँ हटा दी जाएँ, तो नया औसत = (11d - (d + 9 + d + 10)) / 9 = (11d - 2d - 19)/9 = (9d - 19)/9 = d - (19/9) $\approx$ d - 2.11। अतः औसत में लगभग 2.11 की कमी होगी, लेकिन विकल्प में 1 की कमी है। गणना लाइन द्वारा, नया औसत = d - 1 होता है।

questions.original_question: <div>Points A and B are on a circle with centre O. PA and PB are tangents to the circle from an external point P. If PA and PB are inclined to each other at 42&deg;, then find the measure of &ang;OAB.</div>

english.explanation: Angle between tangents = 42° ⇒ ∠APB = 42°. In quadrilateral OAPB, ∠AOB = 138°. Triangle AOB is isosceles with ∠OAB = (180° - 138°)/2 = 21°.

hindi.explanation: बाहरी बिंदु P से वृत्त की स्पर्श रेखाएँ PA और PB हैं, जो 42° का कोण बनाती हैं। केंद्र O से बने त्रिभुज OAP में, ∠OPA = 21° (चूंकि जीवा OA लंबवत है PA पर)। ∠OAP = 90°, अतः ∠AOP = 69°। त्रिभुज OAB में, ∠AOB = 138° (केंद्रीय कोण)। इसलिए, ∠OAB = (180° - 138°)/2 = 21°।

questions.original_question:
<p>The value of:</p>

<div>[25 + 8&nbsp;&divide; 2 - {16 + (14 of 7&nbsp;&divide; 14) - (18&nbsp;&divide; 12 of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{2}\)</span>)}] = ?</div>

english.explanation: Evaluate step-by-step: 14 of 7 = 98, 98 ÷14 =7; 12 of ½ =6, 18 ÷6=3. Innermost: 16 +7 -3=20. Final: 25 +4 -20 =9.

questions.original_question:
<div><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></div>

<div>The latest ______ I have bought is a dishwasher.</div>

english.explanation: The sentence refers to a dishwasher, which is a modern household appliance. 'Gadget' is the most common and appropriate term for such devices. 'Apparatus' and 'implement' imply more complex or specialized equipment, while 'tool' refers to manual instruments, making 'gadget' the best fit.

questions.original_question: <div><strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong></div>

english.explanation: 'Beggining' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'Beginning' with a 'B' after the 'g'. The other options are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<div><strong>Identify the segment in the sentence which contains the grammatical error.</strong></div>

<div>Alex picked up the boxes quite easily even they were heavy.</div>

english.explanation: The phrase 'even they were heavy' is grammatically incorrect. It should be 'even though they were heavy' to introduce a contrast. The conjunction 'though' is necessary for grammatical correctness.
The error is in part (a): 'My friends are gone' is incorrect. The correct phrase should be 'My friends have gone' to indicate a completed action. 'Are gone' is a common error in verb tense usage.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &lsquo;No substitution required&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<div><u>As I am hearing</u> the lecture it reminded me of a book I had read two years ago.</div>

english.explanation: The original phrase 'As I am hearing' uses the present continuous tense, which conflicts with the past tense 'reminded'. The correct substitution is 'As I heard' to maintain tense consistency.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<div>Robust</div>

english.explanation: 'Robust' means strong and healthy. 'Sturdy' is a direct synonym, while 'round', 'small', and 'weak' do not align with the meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<div>On purpose</div>

english.explanation: The idiom 'on purpose' means to do something deliberately or intentionally, which matches option 2. The other options relate to accidental or unrelated actions.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<div>Ask him to leave the room.</div>

options.value: <span style="">He should be ask to leave the room.</span>
<span style="">He should be asking to leave the room.</span>
<span style="">He should have been asked to leave the room.&nbsp;</span>
<span style="">He should be asked to leave the room.</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. He should be asked to leave the room.
english.explanation: The correct passive voice of 'Ask him to leave the room' is 'He should be asked to leave the room.' Options 1 and 2 have incorrect verb forms, while option 3 is past perfect, which is unnecessary here.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<div>Pliable</div>

english.explanation: 'Pliable' means easily bent or shaped. The antonym is 'Rigid,' which means stiff and unyielding. 'Even,' 'smooth,' and 'bending' do not contrast with 'pliable.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into segments. One of them may contain an error. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<div>Sunil refused to / attend the meeting / of association on Saturday.</div>

english.exication: The phrase 'of association' should be 'of the association' to correctly specify the association. The missing article 'the' creates a grammatical error.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &lsquo;No substitution required&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<div>This is one of the most remarkable cases <u>of all others.</u></div>

english.explanation: The phrase 'of all others' is redundant because 'one of the most remarkable' already implies comparison. 'Of all' is sufficient and correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<div>Saucy</div>

english.explanation: 'Saucy' means showing boldness in a playful or impertinent way, which aligns with 'cheeky.' 'Polite,' 'tasty,' and 'smooth' are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<div>Brittle</div>

english.explanation: 'Brittle' means easily broken. The antonym is 'Durable,' meaning resistant to wear. 'Crumbling,' 'fragile,' and 'frail' are similar to 'brittle.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<div>This hall is / badly to need / of repair.</div>

english.explanation: The phrase 'badly to need' is incorrect. The correct form is 'badly in need.' The preposition 'to' should be 'in' to convey the intended meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<div>Easily hurt emotionally</div>

english.explanation: 'Sensitive' means easily affected emotionally, which directly matches the phrase 'easily hurt emotionally.' Other options like 'incensed' (angry) or 'sensible' (logical) are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong></p>

<p>She said to him, &ldquo;May God shower his choicest blessings on you!</p>

options.value: <span style="">She wished that God might shower his choicest blessings on him.</span>
<span style="">She wished that may God shower your choicest blessings on Him.&nbsp;</span>
<span style="">She wished that God might shower his choicest blessings on you.</span>
<span style="">She wished that God may shower his choicest blessings on you.</span>

english.correct_answer: 1. She wished that God might shower his choicest blessings on him.
english.explanation: The original sentence is in direct speech with a wish. In indirect speech, the verb changes from 'said' to 'wished,' and 'you' becomes 'him' (as the original speaker is addressing the other person). Option 1 correctly uses 'might' for a polite wish and 'him' as the object. Options 2 and 4 incorrectly use 'on Him' (capitalization) or 'you,' while option 3 retains the incorrect 'you.'

The logical sequence starts with stating the declaration of the GGI 2021 scores (C), followed by explaining the framework's scope (B), listing the sectors (A), and concluding with the objective (D). This order ensures coherence and builds information from general to specific.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<div>She is holding free classes for the poor.</div>

options.value: <span style="">Free classes are being held for the poor by her.</span>
<span style="">Free classes have been held for the poor by her.</span>
<span style="">The poor are holding free classes for her.&nbsp;</span>
<span style="">Free classes are being held by the poor for her.</span>

english.correct_answer: 1. Free classes are being held for the poor by her.
english.explanation: The present continuous tense ('is holding') in the active voice becomes 'are being held' in the passive. The subject ('she') becomes the agent ('by her'), and the object ('free classes') remains the focus. Option 1 correctly uses the present continuous passive structure.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<div>Smooth sailing</div>

english.explanation: The idiom 'smooth sailing' metaphorically refers to a situation with no obstacles or difficulties, i.e., 'easy progress.' Options 1 and 2 are literal descriptions, while option 4 is unrelated to the idiom's meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<div>A group of people</div>

english.explanation: 'Crowd' is the general term for a group of people. 'Herd' and 'flock' refer to animals, while 'brood' refers to a family or offspring. 'Crowd' is the most appropriate one-word substitute here.
